lines.text: It takes a moment, and you just get to the cusp of what you can hold your breath, before you both break the surface. Percy takes a deep breath, and you guys eventually swim your way over towards the edge of the boat. The fog, by the way, has begun to dissipate now, and has been slowly doing so since your removal of the orb from the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all manage to make your way back onto the surface of the ship, waterlogged and tired, we're going to take a break for the restroom.

lines.text: We do have a Wyrmwood giveaway for you guys in the chat room. Be active in the chat room, just you have to use the phrase 'Wyrmwood', w-y-r-m-w-o-o-d,  in the chat room, once they initiate the actual contest, and we'll come back from the break with the winner. So we'll see you here in a few minutes, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome back to Critical Role! First off, thank you again to our evening's sponsor, Tor Books!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, let's bring it back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, having returned to the ship, the fog lifted, and the path before you now clear, the rest of the open, cloudless sky before you, you continued ahead in the southwestern direction towards the Islands of Anamn, which is where Vesrah exists--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- are they okay? I mean, did I check them out while I was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're getting to that right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to make sure they were okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you come back to the-- as you bring the prisoner down, you lay him down-- and it is a man, early, mid- thirties-ish, maybe looks grizzled, kind of a half beard growing in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- he is drowned at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not breathing, he is waterlogged, and even at a quick glance, you can see he has scars all over his body--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have any residual Control Water left? Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say yeah, you're still concentrating--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I roll him on his side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I see if I can pull any water out of his lungs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Make a wisdom check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (vomit noise) And he's dead. Dead dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is dead may never die!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, you keep scooching back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get down on the low, and you reach out and grab the shoulder, and using the last moments of your Control Water spell, you focus and begin to just siphon the water out of the lungs, and immediately the body kind of convulses, the throat opens up from the outside, and you can see the water just project outward as the chest pushes inward, expelling the rest of the liquid from the lungs. Immediately, (coughs).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do pat, pat, pat, except I cast Lay on Hands when I do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, I cast Cure Wounds while that happens, so go fuck yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seems oddly competitive at this moment, where we're saving a man's life, but all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What last murmurs of this man's life that remained as he began to fade to the drowning, you both manage to just bring him back from the cusp of death, and coughing profusely over the next 30 or so seconds, turning onto his stomach and gathering himself, taking breaths, spitting out whatever seawater still remains in his lungs, he looks back up at you all, and you can see he has a ragged, mouse-brown hair on top, and it's shorter on the sides around the ear, rather large ears, kind of square jaw but very scrawny, and once again from the tattered clothes and scars all over his body, some fresh, some old, looks like he's undergone a rough recent weeks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we're finding Percy all over again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been in that cell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans back, falls onto his palms a bit, and is just kinda laying back, too exhausted to move away, but trying to just move back a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him and make sure? I just don't trust anyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Hotis, it's Hotis, it's Hotis, it's Hotis!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh it is, it's Hotis, it's Hotis!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I don't wanna fight Hotis on the ocean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What you got? What do you got, Grog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep tweeting those pick-up lines to @TorBooks. They like 'em. I do, anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, I'm gonna make a Tor Books run, does anybody want anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems to soften a little bit, though he's still guarded. "Thenton Groose. First Mate of the ship Tempest Fang. Yeah."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tempest Fang. Yeah. It was taken by a bunch of bastards, kept me in that cage for a few weeks."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tempest Fang-- where do you hail from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were you doing on the Ozmit Sea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Making a shipment across to Emon from Issylra, and this group of thugs decided to go "ahead and ransack us from the side. Took our ship down and most of the crew. Kept a few of us alive "underneath. Seems like I was the one who lasted the longest."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but do you just wanna hang out over here? 'Cause Travis is just gonna fuck with your shit again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, in the future-- Travis, what do you think about this-- don't shake your butt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we-- here's my pitch. What if we have two tin cans and a string that just goes to Matt, and we can do like one of these things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I'm just-- I'm glad you came along."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell me, friend. Why did they keep you alive?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was talking back to Captain Adella or one of the crewmates. Not you, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you do that, Captain Adella goes, "Ah, I don't get food. You get food!" And one of the other crewmates, "Oh, oh right." And he immediately jumps down below the deck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we saved your life, how else can we help you, friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, just drop me off at the nearest port you get to, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's going to be a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you sailed frequently before? What was your exact duty on this ship?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Right. He already said that. So, you sail a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any I'd recognize? I was on a boat for quite a while, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a long time ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Okay. None of the symbols you recognize, necessarily, however, the arrangement of them-- the placement of them and the general design are not used as-- there's tattoos you could see they're decoration, there're tattoos you could see that are meant as-- they mean something to the person. These tattoos and their placement seems intentionally to intimidate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mr. Theton Groove, is anyone looking for you right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't think so, my crew went down with the ship."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He kind of looks over at you, "Wha-- what-- why--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That alone makes us like you, but you are a bit weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Forgive us, we have to be a bit wary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't mind if you're disreputable, we just would like to know if you're our kind of disreputable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- sort of a cagey individual that he needed to interrogate, he had an employee named The Dog who was a large man, who would come and just squeeze them until they talked. Why don't we just do that here? It seems like it would be much quicker than talking in circles like this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have The Dog with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we have this guy, who's pretty big--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- and I bet he could squeeze--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I second that method, but I'm just seeing if anybody else--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like that's deeply premature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's deeply immature. I would never do something like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus he's so frail right now, I'm afraid Grog would just break him in half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is noticeably looking nervously back and forth between Taryon and Grog, and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, after all, we saved your life, right? You wouldn't be (yells) hiding nothing, would you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, this is how we treat people we like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fresh water? Oh, thank you." And he pulls it out and just starts drinking thirstily from it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. So we've cleared a few things, right? You seem untrustworthy, and broken, so therefore we like you. What else can we learn about you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look, I have business contacts, "I can get you paid, just get me safe somewhere."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The sort that I do business with, I told you. We deal in trade across the Ozmit."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, he's shifty as fuck, but it's no skin off my back, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got any cages on this boat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we're not-- we don't need that yet, where's he going to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any, like, Clasp markings on him at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That question might be great, but I think we're all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You kinda glance over and look at the middle of his shoulders and his shirt is kind of billowing, and torn. No symbol of the Clasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those scars on your body. Were they from before you were captured, or after?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Some-- both ways. The cages don't really protect very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were they doing to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were just having fun, trying to get information about my company, and, "you know. Being general pirate arseholes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're sure they were just pirates, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, what else are they? Not the most pious men I've ever met."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. I've never met a real pirate until just now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, one of the crewmen comes up with a small cluster of biscuits, and hands them over as he greedily reaches out like, "Oh!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I asked if they would bring him food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Adella just sent him for food.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I asked him to bring food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is he acting like he's starving?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They didn't feed him very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crewman brought food, and he reached out for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't you see everything around you? It's all here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He brings up a plate of biscuits and hungrily starts eating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crewman's a dick, by the way. Just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are good biscuits, starving guy! To be fair, that is kinda your style.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thenton, you will forgive us if we don't give you free rein of the ship while you're on here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just get me back to land, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll promise not to poke you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, you said you travel the Ozmit Sea frequently, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you stumbled upon the island of the Vesrah? The Ashari people of this ocean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we should introduce ourselves, at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are Vox Machina, a travelling group of acrobats, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Defeaters of dragons. No big deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do Van Damme splits, just as he finishes that sentence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket gets up and starts dancing around like he knows what to do, when we say we're performers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I light up my fire hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do have two smarter members that are not here, Scanlan and Pike, but maybe you'll see them later if you stick with us long enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percival, am I misreading the scenario here? Can I please just pour acid on him until he talks to us? It seems like he's holding back, am I misreading, here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am following your lead. But--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When it is time to pour the acid, we will undoubtedly make sure that you are on the front-- not yet--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of her crewmates is currently at the helm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, the closest place to us right now is our desination, most likely, right? We're not gonna be able to dump this guy before we arrive, do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, no, we got maybe a day and a half travel 'til we reach the islands, so--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all right, he can stay on the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got an extra room for him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We got a-- we can throw him in the brig."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can make the brig comfortable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We'll give him food. It's all right, right, Captain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! Pick him up. Throw him in the hole." Two of the crewmen come behind and pick him up, and kind of lean over the shoulder, like, "Ooh, thank you. Thank you very much, all of you." And he gets dragged off down below into the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Captain, have you heard of the Tempest Fang?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was gonna let him finish his whole diatribe before we had a conversation, "but he's one of 18 working companies out of the archipelago, so--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, wait. If he works for one of 18 companies of the archipelago, that means the archipelago has pirates--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pirate companies. It's a very-- some of them have alliances, some of them have very, very deep-rooted rivalries, and yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The companies themselves have more than one ship, if I recall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of them do, depending on the size.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did we just sink one of the other 17 companies of the archipelago?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any extensive damage to our ship? Are we still pretty good, other than the railing getting ripped off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Looking around, my crewmen tell me we're doing all right. So we'll do some repairs when we "drop off at your location. Once you do your business, we'll have some time to go ahead and do "a once-over of our ship."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may have some charts that I stole from the other ship, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I put them in the Bag of Colding for the time being. Pull it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing about, a lot of them are maps of portions of the archipelago, the Hespit Archipelago, some are markings of various pirate headquarters, various places of parlay. A lot of them are waterlogged and soaked and damaged, but you can see elements that are-- a lot of them are hand-drawn notes in sections. The leather tube that you found, you pull it open, and there is a very, very immaculate piece of vellum paper that appears to have a number of glyphs scrawled across it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great! You can Identify things? How many times a day can you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If the spell is higher-level than the caster can use, they must make a spellcasting blah-blah-blah-blah-blah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this basically like the thing in Superman 2 where Lex Luthor's playing chess--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to look up the spell for the specifics, but yeah, it's got some interesting uses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So basically it's you. You can use it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I'm a natural caster. You're the only arcane caster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, hold on to it in case we run into Scanlan again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And with that, I take out the little gem thing that I pulled off the other ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I, more than once a day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at the ability. It's the spell-- I gotta look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All the papers. All the papers in the world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I imagine you're sitting here going--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a first-level spell, so as long as you have a first-level spell slot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I have a spyglass, I didn't even need to ask for Captain Adella's.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a ritual, though, is that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah, if you can use it as a ritual, then it won't use a spell slot when you do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just do it, it just takes time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a fog marker. It can be used by holding it a round, but it is generally used to create a 100-foot-wide fog cloud that lasts for an hour when used.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know how to activate it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To activate it, you have to spend a ten-minute period of time concentrating on the orb, and then as it gets moved, it carries the fog cloud with it and lasts for an hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least, it could be installed in the ship. They could have it as a possible--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could put it in the guts of Dottie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. It's not like he's hollow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, he's got a lot of stuff in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that's not important, that stuff in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you have two wheels and some ropes and it makes a pulley system--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, no, just give it back to me, I'll put it back in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big is the orb, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the ship is still progressing in that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check on it? On the orb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To? What do you want to do with the nature check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To see if it smells like nature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it come from any Water Ashari, or anything like that? (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you my brother? Are you my brother? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a magic item.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it have smoke inside when you turn it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like those weird balls filled with weird sand--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It causes the air-- intense condensation that eventually drips from the outside of it when it's activated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as everything rests down in the ship you can use, you have about a day and a half travel until you're supposed to reach the islands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I post up outside of the brig where stabbed-in-the-body McGee is sleeping?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll forego my room. I just want to sleep sitting up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have rooms? I thought it was like Amex City on this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we have rooms. But they're combined.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're clustered, you have many people per room. They're like bunks. So yeah, you post outside of the brig. As evening comes, the night passes. Is there anything you want to do? You just rest for the night?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just keep the other guard company.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to give him a little expert help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've been tinkering on the ship, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Science-bro stuff. Do we have to tell you what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To tinker it, so I can give you a DC, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So he's got this really cool--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did it work?" Sure, it succeeds. "We built Voltron."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were very cagey about knowing what it is while we were on break, so I didn't know if this was a thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, using one of the opals from my Helm of whatever, Brilliance, he wanted to craft a housing for it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I've built a couple housings for these opals. So, you pop the opal in, and it will allow it to create either a concentrated beam--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spotlight, basically, like a little flashlight, a radiant beam like a torch--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a floodlight, or while it's on spotlight, it's got a little railroad thing, it's got a little slot that will go in and give me a little bit of a red vibe, so we can have a low-light red light, and I'm also going to make a little clip so I can stick it on my gun, so I can have a little spotlight on my gun when we're going through a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It also ensures you cannot get a prom date.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, you've been tinkering a lot lately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's doable. The opal doesn't perpetually glow--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it lasts for an hour. Is that something we can turn off and on and it lasts for an hour, like a battery, or is it just an hour, it's off--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then we have to pop a new opal in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Generally, you have to pop a new opal in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you crack the opal, you put it in, it's like one hour of either flashlight, and then a little blinder to turn it on and off-- it's basically like a little train lantern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was gonna say, like an old-school lighthouse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a tinker check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you just roll it twice, Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I got a 16, but I get plus ten with my tinkerer's tools.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And mine's proficiency bonus and dex bonus on top of that 19? So that's 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the two of you guys, it is not an issue. Even with your limited materials, but your travel-tinkering capabilities-- you manage to deftly create this seamless, beautiful, you could sell it on the street.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So they can-- we may even make a little headband so they can pop it on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You guys are so cute. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I spend my evening reconnecting with Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Hallmark card way of saying fucking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there goes our sponsor by Hallmark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a couple days-- we've been traveling for a while, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was three days before this encounter, you have a day and a half left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And has a day passed since that fight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll see if I get my charges back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to say I feel like I'm being replaced. You know? It's not that. It's just that Percy's kinda found a new friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not hanging out all the time, we're being social.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's not that. I'm a good friend, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was going to say we're being social.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry. You guys aren't there. I got distracted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys are busy tinkering. You two are having a conversation where Vax is trying to console Keyleth's sudden friendship crisis.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Oh! You've got a little smudge right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I know I can't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a very thin wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it was the metric system!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will never know what the metric system means. I don't know what that is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're both, you know, really special and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still a good friend, right? I'm still a good friend?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- and those two have never met--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- a nerd as pure as the other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's fine, it's fine. I'm cool. I'm cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I dry the tears away. Do you know--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (tearfully) New guy and the new guy dynamic! And I don't know what the new guy's chemistry's like!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what's really cool, though? We're not on the verge of death every fucking day right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know, pluses and minuses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (tearfully) I just love Percy so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An evening of consoling and the rest of you guys get your evening's rest, you outside the brig, uneventful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did want to talk, but that's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're finishing up, you're welcome in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Only when you're finishing up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I don't know when you were-- We obviously did it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love that so much, it's so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we put the whole thing together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear, as you guys are finishing up, you hear a knock at the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it filled with smoke in here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi Tary. I didn't see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fun! Exciting! On a boat, even. Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crack, dink) As he flicks the opal, it gives off a bright equivalent of the Light spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically, there's a sun in the room suddenly (crackle).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wow, you guys made a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're literally blinded for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We put it in the box, contain it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, wait, open it just a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I'm gonna take my Helm of Brilliance and just put one of the diamonds up to the laser beam like light coming out so it makes like a dazzling light across the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a lot, it's just a lot of spots right now, but I'm sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You, not you. If you don't mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, of course you can stay--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a lot of dictation to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been meaning to bring something up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the risk of bringing up Scanlan again--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He heard Pike and his daughter, calling to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From the other side. Which is strange really, because when I was on the other side, I don't remember hearing anything. What about you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm gonna sit down and open up a bottle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Courage, I think, is long gone at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going for the Tear whiskey, fuck it Take a swing, and I pass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. I know you well enough to know-- trying not to embarrass you, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're far too wonderful for an idiot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not quite as fearful of whether-- I'm worrying less about what may happen when I die again and if I'm going to go back there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's good. I would hope he's not waiting on the other side for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about when you were killed by Raishan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've overthought this quite a bit and I don't know if you care to hear too many of my fears in this direction, but, I do think about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can always tell me your fears, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where do the people I kill go? I know you don't have an answer, I don't have an answer either, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't, I suppose it depends on them, doesn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it? Or does it depend on me? Or does it now depend on this thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't think they were doomed to suffer the same fate that you were?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe. I don't know, maybe I keep feeding it every time--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't quite know how to find out, other than I had a moment where I thought about shooting someone, bringing them back and asking them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if it comes to it, it's something I've had in my back pocket as killing two birds with one stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can just try that on someone who we already need to kill.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And, I worry about what all of this is doing to us, but at the same time, I have such faith in-- I have such faith in you and Keyleth, and occasionally Grog, and occasionally your brother.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) But I'm starting to wonder if this is what all those heroes I read about when I was young, if this is what they felt, is just a lot of getting very comfortable with not knowing and being nervous and wondering if you're really just the villain of someone else's story.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No one's ever sure they're doing the right thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I did hear you, sorry to-- I did hear you and sorry that I didn't say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's all right. Takes the pressure off, really, knowing that you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I treasure every minute, and you remind me to not be so serious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not saying that you're not serious but-- (sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (exasperated voice) You can go play with Tary some more if you like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm done with Tary for the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great! Then you can play with me! (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And crossing the whiskey off the inventory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- the evening comes to a close, the next day's journey is met with a coming cloudfront, does not appear to be storm-bearing clouds but the clear skies seem to have come to an end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm restless in all of my night's sleep as we get closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hm. As the next day comes to a close, the sun setting, you hear a call from the top of the crow's nest that shouts out, "Land ho!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all catch up and you can see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- just as the last bit of sunlit glow behind the clouds begins to fade into darkness, you see ahead the gentle shape of islands just breaking the horizon ahead, and one by one, little lights (click click click) coming on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rush to the bow of the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come up to the bow of the ship, you can see at this point now, Captain Adella is starting to shout off to the side, "Keep it all high!" and is currently moving around and you see there are three guys at the front who all have lanterns out and they're watching the water below and they're shouting out, "Five to the right!" and they're giving different degrees and she's navigating through what looks to be a channel of reefs, as you glance over the edge. And you can see there are pathways here, but it looks like a lot of this water is very dangerous water and eventually you get to a point where one of them shouts, "Stop! Stop!" and they immediately throw down the sails and someone throws the anchor off the side and the ship (crunching) comes and slams to a halt as the anchor clicks and you can feel it grinding for a bit as it catches the edge of one of-- it looks like a reef below, but the ship eventually stops as you glance over, there maybe 15 feet away from hitting the edge of a reef. (grinding sound) It stops and the water (whistling) slowly comes to rest as the ship comes to a rest. Looking over the edge, you can see the water maybe about 20 or so feet down with what little bit of light the lanterns have put over, you can see the very top of various reef cliffs and hints of beach shelf beginning to rise up towards this cluster of almost like still fairy lights in the distance, unmoving. Captain Adella comes up to the edge of the ship and goes, "Well, that's about as far as we can get with this ship. My apologies."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I run to the edge of the ship and I shoot a Daylight into the spell and throw a Create Water and make a rainbow over top of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So with that (pffff) the spray of vapor in the air of the night sky, the darkness ahead of you that was currently-- the clouds obscuring any sort of starlight, suddenly is showered with a spray of vibrant colors across the entire spectrum, as the vapor slowly cascades around each side of the ship. As it does, a few moments pass and you watch more lights spark open in the distance (puff puff puff puff puff) whatever the source is, you begin to get a clearer view and there you can just barely begin to see the edges of what appear to be a very, very faint outline of a number of buildings all springing up from the water itself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The city is not on one of the islands, the city is in the center of them, there's a triangulation of these land masses and the city itself resides between all three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the guys in the front of the ship start taking small rowing boats and taking them up and latching them in and setting them off the side into the more shallow waters below.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run past all of them and just jump into the water, not gracefully like before and start swimming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh that's just a dexterity check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run to the edge and right as you're about to leap, you look and realize there's relatively shallow reef in the direction you're about to leap, so you kinda turn and (laughs) go at an angle instead and (plop) into the water below.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A second, almost a second after you, the ship (cracks) hits the water below and they start throwing down the rope ladder and you guys are allowed to then step into the rowboat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the broom. Or carpet if you like?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna get on the carpet and offer it to anybody who likes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I need the boat 'cause I'm heavy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to be on the flying carpet, 'cause that's amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket will get in a boat with Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Trinket's gonna be in my necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Trinket goes in the necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so your sister, you guys are taking the carpet--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- Grog, you're going in the boat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a robot. Robot in the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Dottie is not coming with me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, he can come on the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's too heavy for the carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doty cannot come on the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too heavy to go on the carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to stay behind with Doty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there another rowboat for us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have other rowboats on the side, you can request another one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to request another rowboat for Doty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see adventure over this way! Too bad you won't be there to see it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm missing it, hurry up! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to approach, Keyleth, your feet eventually hit sand as opposed to treading water, and as you begin to walk up, the water comes past your waist, down to eventually your knees, and that is about as low as it goes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As far as it goes, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see what looks to be gill slits to the side of the neck, and he looks up at you with kind of a tattered, long-stiffened piece of cloth tunic and shorts that end at the knee,and he kinda looks up at you and just kinda smiles with these very, very bright, orange-ish yellow eyes, "Hi."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kaitiaki. And I drop to my knees and drop down and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sploosh) You go face-down into the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get up and (groans) push the water-- the hair back a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, are you the leader-- are you the headmaster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keyleth. " And he reaches out and grabs your hand. "Yulan."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I bow again, under the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He shakes his head, you can see now he has these tossed medium-length dreadlocks that shake with his head as he turns side to side, (laughs) He looks up at the rest of you, "So! She yours?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just rowing up. What'd I miss?! Start over, start over! (pants)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Well, come with me." And he reaches out and taps you on the shoulder, Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He grabs your hand and pulls you up out of the water, and starts running in towards the city, holding you behind him. Just kinda tugging you by the hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he does know how to use them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Splash, splash, splash splash splash splash...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cooler. Cooler. (blows) And I let a little frost go from my breath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is an ever-present water element to their day to day life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They must have the pruniest feet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would live there in a second!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did that happen just now? How did you just go there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you begin to approach--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at those. Is this fire that you use? Or is it all arcane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not answering any of your questions, and you hear a voice shout out: "Yulan!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And just kinda steps forward through the water--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yulan, you are not to greet our guests! Now, you. What is your name?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kaitiaki. I am honored to be in your presence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I had my own Aramente, long ago. And I knew your "mother who came for her Aramente, as well."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- you are welcome, Keyleth of the Zephra."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm-- sorry, that just means she visited the Earth, and the Fire, and the Water Ashari. She completed her Aramente.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What hap-- She-- I-- Everywhere I've been, she's been. Why not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, Keyleth, the Aramente is not easy."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you know what this leg of your journey entails?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I've made it this far. In my heart, I feel like I'm almost complete, but I feel like you're about to tell me something different.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The source of the lodestones, in which we have built and maintained this city. But "the once-challenging path to these lodestones has now become deadly for all but our swiftest."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "An ancient beast, once guided upon creation by the Titans that claimed this world their own "before the gods came and gave light to our souls."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are known in many languages, by many names, "but the common tongue knows to them as the krakens."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And this beast appears to have been producing the lodestones that we relied on for ages. This "research, and information they've gathered, however, garnished the attention of this terrible "fiend, and was accidentally led directly to the rift where it now nests, and feeds on the other "creatures naturally drawn to the energy of the tear between the worlds. We now use the lodestones "and our powers not only to control the merging of the planes at the rift, but to also prevent this "monstrosity from crossing over into our world and tearing our city asunder. Your task--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Avoid the beast if possible, for to battle it is folly, and to kill it is to sink our city, "and curse the rift, to eventually fade."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't kill the kraken. Right? Don't kill the kraken?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get three lodestones, bring it back, don't kill him because he is responsible for you guys not sinking into the ocean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. So he drops these lodestones at the base of the water plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Often found within the vicinity of the rift, but such is the beast. Be quick, be careful, "be stealthy, and return as soon as you have them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have an example of these lodestones so that we know what we're looking for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will show you at the Aerie tomorrow in the morning."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You totally said that, didn't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there something that helps those of us who don't breathe underwater breathe underwater?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can handle that. So. What happened to my mother?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She swallows strongly. "Your mother was a brave woman, very much like you, now that I see "you before me. Unsure of herself, and wishing to please, and not disappoint. And it's hard to "ascertain but I fear it's perhaps that lack of confidence that may have caused her failure."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did she not make it out? Of the water plane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Our guides brought her to the rift, and her companions did not survive. Your mother did not "return, and we sent scouts to try and retrieve her body so she could be interred correctly, "but we only found a leg."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's still alive. That means she's still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold onto that hope. Use it, and finish what she started. She lives through you at the "very least. Hold that memory."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will hold on to it, but I hope you know that does not define me. I'm not her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Then perhaps you have a chance."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll complete your task. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For tomorrow, you face the pet of the Titans." And that's where we'll leave tonight's session.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, we're not gonna kill a kraken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are going to not kill it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are going to irritate a kraken.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are going to make it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- We're going to steal some kraken's poop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no idea what that means.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what a kraken is like in D&D, but I'm fucking stoked to find out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're gonna bring a bottle of Kraken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're gonna bring a bottle of Kraken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm so gonna bring a bottle of Kraken next game!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what else we're gonna do? We're not gonna finish it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're not gonna finish it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's game, we do not finish it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're gonna drink most of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're gonna drink most of it, but we're not gonna kill the kraken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Except for like one-fourth of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: TALIESIN. Don't. 'Cause we don't kill the kraken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. We'll bring this up next week on Thursday for the last leg of Keyleth's Aramente--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- as the party might face a kraken!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm most afraid of!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That she's the full Long John Silver.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's gonna go pirate, she's gonna have a patch and a beard--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She totally has a peg leg.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And like a little cuttlefish instead of a instead of a parrot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is not the key at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, get us out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you again, Tor Books, for sponsoring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (incoherent background noise) Tor Books, toy boats, Tor Books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm gonna be jumping in for one episode of the Swan Song series.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will be fun. Yeah! I get to play!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that where you have to roll backwards?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And, as always, don't forget to watch Talks Machina on Tuesday--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you talking about, guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rest well. Laura, get up early.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. Is it Thursday yet?
